SELECT show_no, show_name, show_startdate, show_closedate, show_round, show_time1, show_time2, show_poster FROM media_tb WHERE show_status = 1 AND
show_closedate > sysdate
ORDER BY show_startdate DESC

SELECT show_no, show_name, show_startdate, show_closedate, show_round, show_time1, show_time2, show_poster FROM media_tb WHERE show_status = 0 AND
show_closedate > sysdate
ORDER BY show_startdate ASC

SELECT show_no, show_name, show_price, show_round, show_time1, show_time2, show_content1, show_content2, show_poster, show_startdate, show_closedate, media_name, media_director FROM media_tb WHERE show_no = #{showNo} AND show_status = 1

SELECT show_no, show_name, show_price, show_round, show_time1, show_time2, show_content1, show_content2, show_poster, show_startdate, show_closedate, media_name, media_director FROM media_tb WHERE show_no = #{showNo} AND show_status = 0

show_closedate > sysdate
